title: Council Decision of 12 July 1993 appointing a full member and an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 12 July 1993 appointing a full member and an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training
(93/C 200/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Mr Konstantinos KOUKOURAS is hereby appointed a full member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training in place of Mrs Maria KANELLOPOULOU for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which expires on 29 June 1995.

Mrs Georgia MELISSARATOU is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Adisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training in place of Mr Konstantinos KOUKOURAS for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which expires on 29 June 1995.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 July 1993.
For the Council
The President
Ph. MAYSTADT
(1) OJ No L 253, 24. 9. 1985, p. 43.
(2) OJ No C 208, 15. 8. 1992, p. 2.
